sentences.en: "Angels with Dirty Faces" is a Cagney gangster pic.
sentences.cn: 《一世之雄》是一部由卡格尼主演的黑帮片。

sentences.en: A gangster promptly kidnaps Han's darling daughter - and demands $ 50 million as ransom.
sentences.cn: 一名歹徒随即绑架了韩的宝贝女儿 — 并索要五千万美元的赎金.

sentences.en: Gangster Johnny on TV: You was here last night too , wasn't ya?
sentences.cn: 电视上的男匪: 你昨晚在这, 是 吧 ?

sentences.en: He died as any self-respecting gangster should — in a hail of bullets.
sentences.cn: 他死于乱枪之下——匪徒典型的最终下场。

sentences.en: The ferocious look in the gangster's eyes scared her very much.
sentences.cn: 歹徒目露凶光的样子让她很害怕.

sentences.en: The gangster ended up in the electric chair.
sentences.cn: 那个歹徒最后是在电椅上被杀死的.

sentences.en: The gangster sat poker - faced throughout the trial.
sentences.cn: 整个审判过程中,那个流氓一直面无表情地坐在那儿.

sentences.en: The gangster stabbed an innocent person to death.
sentences.cn: 歹徒扎死了一名无辜者.

sentences.en: The gangster stole a gun and shot his way out of prison.
sentences.cn: 歹徒偷到一枝枪一路杀出监狱.

sentences.en: The gangster walked into the room surrounded by his cohort.
sentences.cn: 一名匪徒走进被他的一帮人包围的屋子.

sentences.en: The gangster was flushed out from his hideout.
sentences.cn: 匪徒从藏匿处被驱赶出来.

sentences.en: The gangster's friends bought off the police witness.
sentences.cn: 那坏蛋的朋友买通了警察方面的证人.

sentences.en: The plotline revolved around the fall of Chas, a minor London gangster.
sentences.cn: 主要情节是围绕一位名叫查斯的伦敦黑帮小混混如何走向毁灭的过程展开的。

sentences.en: The police are hard on the track of the gangster.
sentences.cn: 警察正在追踪那名匪徒.

sentences.en: You've called gangster friends to help you settle a dispute.
sentences.cn: 你找黑道朋友帮你解决纠纷.

trans.tran_en: a member of a violent group of criminals
